column1: Test Case7: User Verify  that Scrolling/Navigation Within the Carousel

column4: user redirected to the home page

column2: Click on the left arrow ("<") located on the carousel
column4:
The carousel should scroll to the left, displaying the previous product 
If there are no previous products, the carousel should either loop back to the last product or remain unchanged.

column2: Click on the right arrow (">") located on the carousel.
column4:
The carousel should scroll to the right, displaying the next product (if any).
If there are no next products, the carousel should either loop back to the first product or remain unchanged
